attributes.action: commit to bringing about an improvement in  the nurse/patient ratio in hospital wards that care for Cancer patients.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Cancer patients have particular needs, they require more time than most patients as they need to express their feelings and fears. Patients often wish to talk to their Nurse and it is important that they are able to do so.
Cancer wards should have higher levels of Nursing staff than General Medical wards.
